text: Hi all. We are working through some SEO stuff on our pages, we’d like to be able to remove the canonical url default, but just from 1 page.  They let you remove it from the whole site. Anyone have any ideas, or the correct channel to pose this question on? Thanks.

Hey Rolando,

Are you referring to something like this in the individual page settings?

yeah basically for one page we’d like to not have HS infer it… this is because we need the Canonical URL to have the query string value in it but HS doesn’t have a way for us to tell it to do. All that to say, we need to dynamically create the canonical URL
